General.Name: Asian Star Anchor Chain Co Ltd Jiangsu
General.Description: Asian Star Anchor Chain Co., Ltd. Jiangsu, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the manufacture and sale of anchor chains, marine mooring chains, and related accessories worldwide. It offers marine anchor chains and offshore mooring chains, including stud and studless links; mining chains; accessories, such as shackles, swivels, eye plates, mounting rings, and mooring hooks; and other products comprising chafe and buoy chains, and anchors. The company also exports its products. Asian Star Anchor Chain Co., Ltd. Jiangsu was founded in 1981 and is based in Jingjiang, the People's Republic of China.
